name: s3proxy-docker
description: Docker runtime for S3Proxy NodeJS Express Application

scripts.docker: echo running s3proxy:test && npm run credentials && docker run --cpus .3 -e PM2_INSTANCES=1 -v $PWD/credentials.json:/src/credentials.json:ro -p 8080:8080 -e AWS_REGION=us-east-1 -e BUCKET=s3proxy-public -t s3proxy:test; rm credentials.json
scripts.dockerize-for-test: docker buildx build --progress plain --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --target test --load -t s3proxy:test .
scripts.dockerize-for-prod-dockerhub: docker buildx build --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --push --target production -t forkzero/s3proxy:$npm_package_version --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 .
scripts.software-bill-of-materials: docker buildx build --build-arg VERSION=$npm_package_version --load --target production -t forkzero/s3proxy:$npm_package_version . && syft forkzero/s3proxy:$npm_package_version > ./image-sbom.txt
scripts.docker-login-aws: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin ${AWS_ACCOUNT}.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

author: George Moon
